name: Challenge - clear the colors
description: Set the colours as illustrated and starting from any position clear the colours in sequence.

name: Three red
description: Set the three red balls as illustrated and starting from any position  clear the three reds in any sequence.

name: Safety behind the line
description: Set the red ball in the pink spot and the white ball in the yellow or the green spot. Pot the red ball and try aim to get back to the bottom cushion with the white ball int the space between bottom cushion and the base line.

name: Break-building line
description: Starting from any position aim to pot red/black combinations and try to clear the table.

name: Safety behind the colors
description: Play a safety shot aiming to come off 4 cushions placing the white ball behind the line of the colours and snookering on the red ball.
